name: SplashTab
description: A Chrome extension that styles your new tab page to show a striking image from Unsplash.com along with the current time and date.
author: Victor Diaz de Leon

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://images.unsplash.com data: blob:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com;
